transport.question: I have wheels and carry people around town. What am I?

hints.text: 🚌 I often stop to pick up and drop off passengers.
🚦 You can ride me with a ticket or pass.
🗺️ I follow a set route.

transport.question: I float on the water and carry people or things across a lake or ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I need water to move.
⚓ I often have a horn that makes a loud sound.
🧭 You might take me on a vacation.

transport.question: I have two wheels and you use your feet to make me go. What am I?

hints.text: 🚴 I can be hard to balance on at first.
🛣️ You can ride me on a bike path.
🛎️ I sometimes have a bell.

transport.question: I travel on tracks and can carry many people long distances. What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ I make a 'choo choo' sound.
💺 I have many seats inside.
🕰️ You can take me to different cities.

transport.question: I fly high in the sky and take people to faraway places. What am I?

hints.text: ✈️ I need a runway to take off and land.
☁️ You can see clouds from my windows.
🧳 You need a passport to travel on me internationally.

transport.question: I help firefighters put out fires. I have a loud siren. What am I?

hints.text: 🚨 I am usually red.
💧 I carry lots of water.
🔥 I arrive quickly to emergencies.

transport.question: I carry heavy loads and have many wheels. What am I?

hints.text: 📦 I transport goods from place to place.
🛣️ You see me on the highway.
🚚 I am bigger than a car.

transport.question: I travel underground and carry people quickly through a city. What am I?

hints.text: 🚇 I'm sometimes called the subway.
🚦 I travel on tracks but underground.
🗺️ I help people avoid traffic jams.

transport.question: I have wings and spin around on top, taking people straight up into the air. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I can hover in one place.
🏥 I can be used for medical emergencies.
🚨 Sometimes I help the police.

transport.question: I need a launchpad and can travel to space. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 I am very fast.
👩‍🚀 Astronauts travel in me.
🪐 I can travel to the moon and beyond.

cosmos.question: I shine bright in the night sky, but I'm not a star. I travel around the Earth. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 Sometimes I'm full, sometimes I'm just a sliver.
🧀 People sometimes say I'm made of cheese!
🌎 I am Earth's closest neighbor.

cosmos.question: I am big and round, and give Earth light and warmth. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am a giant ball of hot gas.
😎 You need sunglasses to look at me directly.
🌼 Plants need me to grow.

cosmos.question: I'm a group of stars that makes a picture in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ Some of us look like animals, people, or objects.
Some are named after Greek myths.
🔭 You can see me better with a telescope.

cosmos.question: I am a giant ball of gas that makes my own light. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ Our Sun is an example of me.
🔥 I am very hot!
✨ I twinkle in the night sky.

cosmos.question: I am the planet where we live. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am mostly covered in water.
🌍 I am the only planet known to support life.
🌱 I have trees, grass, and animals.

cosmos.question: I am a planet known for my beautiful rings. What am I?

hints.text: 🪐 My rings are made of ice and rock.
💨 I am a gas giant.
📻 I am named after a Roman god of agriculture.

cosmos.question: I am a rock that orbits the Sun, but I'm smaller than a planet. What am I?

hints.text: 💥 Some people think I helped cause the dinosaurs to disappear.
🌑 I can sometimes be found in the asteroid belt.
☄️ When I enter Earth's atmosphere, I might become a shooting star.

cosmos.question: I am a huge group of stars, gas, and dust held together by gravity. What am I?

hints.text: 🌌 The Milky Way is my home.
💫 I come in different shapes, like spiral and elliptical.
🔭 I am incredibly vast!

cosmos.question: I am a celestial body, smaller than a planet, that orbits a planet. What am I?

hints.text: 🌑 The Earth has only one of me, but other planets have many!
🛰️ Sometimes humans launch artificial versions of me.
🌕 I reflect the Sun's light.

cosmos.question: I am a cloud of gas and dust in space, often where new stars are born. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I can be very colorful and beautiful.
✨ Some of me look like animals or other shapes.
🌌 I'm found within galaxies.
